reports.report: the report name, to be used in GUI

config.filter: SQL WHERE condition to filter data, being 'acc': account code; 'cc': cost center code; 'item': item code
config.mask: SQL WHERE condition to mask details, being 'acc': account code; 'cc': cost center code; 'item': item code
